snippet.title: EXOCIDE - Reveal Trailer | RazerCon 2022
snippet.description:
Apogee (Duke Nukem, Max Payne, Prey [2006], Turbo Overkill) brings you EXOCIDE! Humans created super bugs to fight as soldiers. And the bugs turned against us. You're the last Handler, a human + AI robotic team with 4 total arms capable of welding 4 weapons, or one GIANT gun. Stop the super swarms before total human extinction.

STEAM: ► https://apo.gg/EXOCIDE
DISCORD: ► https://discord.gg/apogee
TWITTER: ► https://twitter.com/apogee_ent
INSTAGRAM: ► https://www.instagram.com/apogeeentertainment
FACEBOOK: ► https://www.facebook.com/ApogeeEnt
TIKTOK: ► https://www.tiktok.com/@apogeeentertainment

#Apogee #Exocide #RetroFPS
